data.title: BRIDGEVILLE, SULLIVAN CO., NY, BRIDGEVILLE CEMETERY
data.text:
This Cemetery is located on the left hand side of the Neversink River dirt road, and about one-half mile from the Bridgeville Methodist Churchl It is surrounded by a low stone wall and is in very bad condition because of neglect.
